version 1.1.1 <14 Mei 2014> - 
    * Add new helper functions for easier mobile responsive layout
    * Fix for WP 3.9

version 1.1.0 <6 February 2014> - 
    * Upgrade to bootstrap3
    * Create default style for calibrefx front end
    * Much better mobile responsive
    * New Admin Backend UI
    * Add CFX Generator for automatic action hook
    * Better Performance and cache
    * Security enchanced
    * Now support modules activation and deactivation

---

version 1.0.18 <23 December 2013> - 
    * Fix styling for WordPress 3.8
    * End of development cycle

version 1.0.17 <13 December 2013> - 
    * Disable calibrefx admin bar because it will break WordPress 3.8 new admin design
    * Update logo hook
    * Fix image helper bugs

version 1.0.16 <5 October 2013> - 
    * Fix all shortcodes helpers and buttons
    * Fix admin area styling
    * Add linkedin share shortcode 

version 1.0.15 <11 August 2013> - 
    * New Admin Backend Design
    * Add Email Settings, SMTP and Sendmail
    * Add Font awesome
    * Fix SEO Bugs in title and description
    * Fix CSS Bugs
    * Fix PHP Error for Strict Standard when using PHP 5.4
    * Add compatibility for WordPress v3.6
    * Add New Twitter Widget and remove the old one for compatibility
    * Add Default contact form to widget, shortcode and page template
    * Add Autoresponder feature for Aweber, GetResponse and Mailventure

version 1.0.14 <7 May 2013> - 
    * Add more shortcode buttons to the tinymce editor
    * Fix styling for responsive layout
    * Fix many bugs and error suprresions when WP_DEBUG true
    * Add contact for features
    * Add new twitter box widget
    * Fix style when responsive layout is disabled

version 1.0.13 <3 April 2013> - 
    * Add mobile site function for child themes. This feature for showing different themes in mobile
    * Update shortcode function and styles to use bootstrap v2.3.1
    * Fix minor styling

version 1.0.11 <25 March 2013> - 
    * Update to bootstrap v2.3.1
    * Add more apply_filters in post_hook, header_hook
    * Using bootstrap as standard for row-fluid and container-fluid
    * Update JQuery cycle to v2
    * Fix minor styling

version 1.0.10 <7 March 2013> - 
    * Add some functions to helpers
    * Update icons
    * Add Form Builder Library
    * Add Email Library
    * Fix minor styling

version 1.0.9 <24 February 2013> - 
    * Fix some minor bugs
    * Harden security
    * Fix SEO Bugs
    * Fix social scripts

version 1.0.8 <15 Januari 2013> - 
    * Fix some minor bugs

version 1.0.7 <5 December 2012> - 
    * Allow Cross Settings Other Theme Settings

version 1.0.6 <4 December 2012> - 
    * Fix Bugs in SEO Settings
    * Add English PO translation
    * Add Indonesia PO Translation
    * Remove unnecessary css styles 
    * Fix many bugs in theme settings

version 1.0.5 <12 November 2012> - 
    * Add Rich Snippet For Breadcrumb
    * Add Social Settings
    * Add Google Author Verfied URL
    * Add Google Publisher Verified URL
    * Fix many other bugs

version 1.0.4 <22 October 2012> - 
    * Fix Many Bugs in SEO Features
    * Fix Many Default CSS Styles
    * Allow user to disable seo feature for compatibility with other SEO Plugins
    * Allow SEO For Custom Post Type and Custom Taxonomy
    * Now Shortcode Helper load in autoload
    * get_content_limit now can do wrap_close
    * Fix many bugs in theme settings

version 1.0.4 <22 October 2012> - 
    * Fix Many Bugs in SEO Features
    * Fix Many Default CSS Styles
    * Allow user to disable seo feature for compatibility with other SEO Plugins
    * Allow SEO For Custom Post Type and Custom Taxonomy
    * Now Shortcode Helper load in autoload
    * get_content_limit now can do wrap_close
    * Fix many bugs in theme settings

version 1.0.3 <11 September 2012> - 
    * Use Bootloader
    * No more complicated init.php
    * Using Loader to include helpers, library, widgets, config, etc
	* Enable to load child path
	* Add Curl Library
	* Driver Module
	* Fix Some Styles and JQuery crash
	* Patch for *nix environment
	* Compatible With WP List Table

version 1.0.2 <10 August 2012> -
    * update bootstrap to version 2.0
    * simplified settings
    * fix many bugs

version 1.0.0 <15 June 2012> -
    * tinymce/plugin.js - Fixed shortcode image URL
    * tinymce/config.php - Fixed shortcode bug
    * template-contact.php - Fixed bug
    * functions/theme-shortcodes.php - Tabs now support multiple instances
    * style.css - Version number change, fixed tab widget bug
    * functions.php - Fixed enqueue bug
    * comments.php - translation fix
